description: Try our easy to follow Connoisseur Ice Cream Raspberry, Nut And Chocolate Ice Cream Pudding  recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Connoisseur Ice Cream Raspberry, Nut And Chocolate Ice Cream Pudding Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1L Connoisseur classic vanilla ice cream, softened

recipeInstructions.text: Lightly brush oil on the inside of a 1.5 litre capacity bowl. Line the bowl with a double layer of plastic wrap or baking paper, leaving approximately 10cm of overhang.
Transfer Connoisseur Classic Vanilla Ice Cream to a large bowl. Gently fold in the raspberries, hazelnuts, pistachios, and chocolate.
Transfer to the lined bowl and cover the top of the ice cream with a round piece of baking paper. Fold overhanging cling wrap/baking paper.
Place in the freezer for at least 24hrs.
Lift the pudding out of the bowl and transfer to a cold serving plate. Decorate with berries and drizzle with maple syrup.
